publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2310 John Farquhar Munro: Concessionary Tolls on the Skye Bridgeâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the proposed introduction of concessionary bus fares for pensioners across Scotland; recognises that the high cost of crossing the Skye Bridge places a heavy burden on pensioners living on limited incomes, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to investigate the introduction of concessionary tolls on the Skye Bridge to run until the tolls are scrapped altogether. Supported by: Irene McGugan*, Robert Brown*, Robin Harper*, Stewart Stevenson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Brian Adam*
S1M-2310 Concessionary Tolls on the Skye Bridge (lodged on 5 October 2001) Mr Mike Rumbles*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-2310 Concessionary Tolls on the Skye Bridge (lodged on 5 October 2001) Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2310 Concessionary Tolls on the Skye Bridge (lodged on 5 October 2001) Michael Russell*, Tavish Scott*, Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-2310 Concessionary Tolls on the Skye Bridge (lodged on 5 October 2001) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2310 Concessionary Tolls on the Skye Bridge (lodged on 5 October 2001) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2310 Concessionary Tolls on the Skye Bridge (lodged on 5 October 2001) Shona Robison*
S1M-2310 Concessionary Tolls on the Skye Bridge (lodged on 5 October 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2310 Concessionary Tolls on the Skye Bridge (lodged on 5 October 2001) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S1M-2310 Concessionary Tolls on the Skye Bridge (lodged on 5 October 2001) Andrew Wilson*
